description.brazilian: Morra.
description.english: Die
description.french: Mourir.
description.german: Stirb
description.italian: Muori.
description.schinese: 死亡。
description.spanish: Muere.

description.brazilian: Alcance o segundo Segmento.
description.english: Reach Segment two
description.french: Atteindre le segment deux.
description.german: Erreiche den zweiten Abschnitt
description.italian: Raggiungi il Segmento due.
description.schinese: 到达第二部分。
description.spanish: Alcanza la sección dos.

description.brazilian: Alcance o terceiro Segmento.
description.english: Reach Segment three
description.french: Atteindre le segment trois.
description.german: Erreiche den dritten Abschnitt
description.italian: Raggiungi il Segmento tre.
description.schinese: 到达第三部分。
description.spanish: Alcanza la sección tres.

description.brazilian: Alcance o quarto Segmento.
description.english: Reach Segment four
description.french: Atteindre le segment quatre.
description.german: Erreiche den vierten Abschnitt.
description.italian: Raggiungi il Segmento quattro.
description.schinese: 到达第四部分。
description.spanish: Alcanza la sección cuatro.

description.brazilian: Alcance a varanda.
description.english: Reach the balcony
description.french: Atteindre le balcon.
description.german: Erreiche den Balkon
description.italian: Raggiungi il balcone.
description.schinese: 到达露台。
description.spanish: Alcanza el balcón.

description.brazilian: Escape da torre.
description.english: Escape the tower
description.french: S’évader de la tour.
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Turm
description.italian: Fuggi dalla torre.
description.schinese: 逃出塔楼。
description.spanish: Escapa de la torre.

description.brazilian: Escape da torre 50 vezes.
description.english: Escape the tower 50 times
description.french: S’évader de la tour 50 fois.
description.german: Entkomme 50 x aus dem Turm
description.italian: Fuggi dalla torre 50 volte.
description.schinese: 逃出塔楼 50 次。
description.spanish: Escapa de la torre 50 veces.

description.brazilian: Entre e saia da torre na mesma partida.
description.english: Enter and leave the tower in the same run
description.french: Entrer et sortir de la tour en un seul run.
description.german: Betrete und verlasse den Turm im selben Versuch
description.italian: Entra ed esci dalla torre nella stessa sessione.
description.russian: Войти в башню и сбежать из неё за одно прохождение.
description.schinese: 在同一次逃脱中进入并离开塔楼。
description.spanish: Entra y sal de la torre en la misma partida.
description.turkish: Aynı elde kuleye gir ve çık.

description.brazilian: Escape e termine o jogo como monstro.
description.english: Escape and end the game as a monster
description.french: S’évader et finir le jeu en monstre.
description.german: Entkomme und beende das Spiel als Monster
description.italian: Scappa e termina la partita nei panni di un mostro.
description.schinese: 作为怪物逃出并结束游戏。
description.spanish: Escapa y acaba el juego como un monstruo.
description.turkish: Canavar olarak kaç ve oyunu bitir.

description.brazilian: Escape da torre em 15 minutos ou menos.
description.english: Escape the tower in 15 minutes or less
description.french: S’évader de la tour en 15 minutes ou moins.
description.german: Entkomme in maximal 15 Minuten aus dem Turm
description.italian: Fuggi dalla torre in 15 minuti o meno.
description.schinese: 用不超过 15 分钟逃出塔楼。
description.spanish: Escapa de la torre en 15 minutos o menos.

description.brazilian: Escape da torre sem matar ninguém.
description.english: Escape the tower without killing anyone
description.french: S’évader de la tour sans tuer personne.
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Turm, ohne zu töten
description.italian: Fuggi dalla torre senza uccidere nessuno.
description.russian: Сбежать из башни, никого не убивая.
description.schinese: 在不杀死任何人的情况下逃出塔楼。
description.spanish: Escapa de la torre sin matar a nadie.

displayName.brazilian: Não é um bicho de estimação

description.brazilian: Liberte Hubert.
description.english: Free Hubert
description.french: Libérer Hubert.
description.german: Befreie Hubert
description.italian: Libera Hubert.
description.schinese: 释放 Hubert。
description.spanish: Libera a Hubert.

description.brazilian: Liberte Alva.
description.english: Free Alva
description.french: Libérer Alva.
description.german: Befreie Alva
description.italian: Libera Alva.
description.schinese: 释放 Alva。
description.spanish: Libera a Alva.

description.brazilian: Liberte Sobu.
description.english: Free Sobu
description.french: Libérer Sobu.
description.german: Befreie Sobu
description.italian: Libera Sobu.
description.schinese: 释放 Sobu。
description.spanish: Libera a Sobu.

description.brazilian: Encontre dez ou mais amigos durante uma visita à taverna.
description.english: Meet ten or more friends during one visit to the tavern
description.french: Rencontrer au moins dix amis en un passage à la taverne.
description.german: Triff mindestens zehn deiner Freunde bei einem Besuch in der Taverne
description.italian: Incontra dieci o più amici durante una visita alla taverna.
description.russian: Повстречать не менее 10 друзей во время одного визита в таверну.
description.schinese: 在单次酒馆之旅中遇见至少十个朋友。
description.spanish: Encuéntrate con por lo menos diez amigos en una visita a la taberna.
description.turkish: Meyhaneye tek ziyarette en az on arkadaşla buluş.

description.brazilian: Perda três ou mais companheiros durante uma partida.
description.english: Lose three or more companions during a run
description.french: Perdre trois compagnons ou plus pendant un run.
description.german: Verliere mindestens drei Gefährten in nur einem Versuch
description.italian: Perdi tre o più compagni durante una sessione.
description.russian: Потерять не менее 3 спутников во время прохождения.
description.schinese: 在某次逃脱中失去至少三个伙伴。
description.spanish: Pierde a tres compañeros o más durante una partida.
description.turkish: Bir elde üç veya daha çok yoldaş yitir.

description.brazilian: Use a clava de Hubert (ou seu corpo) para matar o inimigo que o matou.
description.english: Use Hubert's club or corpse to kill the enemy that killed him
description.french: Utiliser le gourdin ou le cadavre d’Hubert pour tuer l’ennemi qui l’a tué.
description.german: Nutze Huberts Knüppel oder seine Leiche, um den Feind zu erledigen, der ihn getötet hat
description.italian: Usa il randello di Hubert o il suo corpo per uccidere il nemico che l'ha ucciso.
description.russian: Убить убийцу Губерта дубиной Губерта или мёртвым Губертом.
description.schinese: 使用 Hubert 的棍子或尸体除掉害死他的敌人。
description.spanish: Usa el garrote de Hubert o su cadáver para matar al enemigo que lo mató.
description.turkish: Hubert'i öldüreni Hubert'in cesedi veya sopasıyla öldür.

description.brazilian: Mate 500 inimigos.
description.english: Kill 500 enemies
description.french: Tuer 500 ennemis.
description.german: Töte 500 Gegner
description.italian: Uccidi 500 nemici.
description.schinese: 干掉 500 个敌人。
description.spanish: Mata a 500 enemigos.

description.brazilian: Mate inimigos usando 100 itens diferentes.
description.english: Kill enemies using 100 different items
description.french: Tuer des ennemis avec 100 objets différents.
description.german: Nutze 100 verschiedene Gegenstände, um Feinde zu töten
description.italian: Uccidi i nemici usando 100 oggetti diversi.
description.russian: Убить врагов с помощью 100 разных предметов.
description.schinese: 使用 100 个不同的物品干掉敌人。
description.spanish: Mata a enemigos con 100 objetos diferentes.

description.brazilian: Mate três tipos de inimigos usando o corpo de sua própria espécie em uma única partida.
description.english: Kill three types of enemies using a body of their own kind during a single run
description.french: Tuer trois types d’ennemis en un seul run à l’aide d’un corps de la même espèce.
description.german: Töte in nur einem Versuch drei Arten von Feind mit jeweils einer Leiche ihrer eigenen Spezies
description.italian: Uccidi tre tipi di nemici usando il corpo di un nemico dello stesso tipo in una sola sessione.
description.russian: За одно прохождение убить врагов трёх видов трупом их сородича.
description.schinese: 在单次逃脱中使用敌人的尸体干掉三种敌人（尸体与敌人需为同一类型）
description.spanish: Mata a tres tipos de enemigos usando el cadáver de su especie en una partida.
description.turkish: Tek elde üç düşman türünü kendi türünden cesetlerle öldür.

description.brazilian: Faça um inimigo adormecido devorar três ou mais objetos de uma só vez.
description.english: Have one sleeping enemy eat three or more objects at once
description.french: Faire manger au moins trois objets d’un coup à un ennemi endormi.
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass ein schlafender Feind mindestens drei Objekte auf einmal verschlingt
description.italian: Fai in modo che un nemico addormentato mangi tre o più oggetti contemporaneamente.
description.russian: За один раз скормить спящему врагу не менее трёх предметов.
description.schinese: 使一个睡着的敌人同时吃下至少三个物品。
description.spanish: Que un enemigo se coma tres objetos o más de una vez en sueños.
description.turkish: Uyuyan bir düşmana tek seferde üç veya daha çok obje yedir.

displayName.french: Faites la danse, pas la guerre !
displayName.german: Schwing das Tanzbeil, statt der Keule
displayName.italian: Non fate la guerra, fate la danza!

description.brazilian: Evite a banda de monstros ao se mover no ritmo deles.
description.english: Dodge the monster band by moving to their beat
description.french: Esquiver le groupe de monstres en suivant son tempo.
description.german: Entkomme der Monster-Band, indem du zu ihrem Beat tanzt
description.italian: Evita la banda di mostri muovendoti al loro ritmo.
description.russian: Избежать драки с группой монстров, двигаясь в такт их песне.
description.schinese: 按照怪物乐队的节奏移动，躲开它们。
description.spanish: Esquiva a la banda de monstruos moviéndote al ritmo de su música.
description.turkish: Canavar bandosundan ritme ayak uydurarak sıyrıl.

description.brazilian: Vença o jogo dos copos.
description.english: Win a game of cups
description.french: Gagner le jeu des gobelets.
description.german: Gewinne eine Partie des Hütchenspiels
description.italian: Vinci una partita del gioco delle tre tazze.
description.schinese: 赢得一局杯子游戏。
description.spanish: Gana una partida al trilero.

description.brazilian: Mate o monstro do jogo dos copos.
description.english: Kill the cup player
description.french: Tuer le maître des gobelets.
description.german: Töte den Hütchenspieler
description.italian: Uccidi il tazziere.
description.schinese: 干掉杯子玩家。
description.spanish: Mata al trilero.

description.brazilian: Solucione dez charadas diferentes.
description.english: Solve ten different riddles
description.french: Résoudre dix énigmes différentes.
description.german: Löse zehn verschiedene Rätsel
description.italian: Risolvi dieci indovinelli diversi.
description.schinese: 解开十个不同的谜题。
description.spanish: Resuelve diez acertijos diferentes.

description.brazilian: Mate o Mestre da Charada.
description.english: Kill the riddle master
description.french: Tuer le maître des énigmes.
description.german: Töte den Rätsel-Master
description.italian: Uccidi il signor Enigmista.
description.schinese: 干掉谜语大师。
description.spanish: Mata al Maestro del Adivinar.

name: The tower has a new master

displayName.brazilian: A torre tem um novo mestre
displayName.english: The tower has a new master
displayName.french: Le maître est mort, vive le maître !
displayName.german: Der Turm hat einen neuen Meister
displayName.italian: La torre ha un nuovo signore
displayName.spanish: El nuevo maestro de la torre

description.brazilian: Mate Evelius.
description.english: Kill Evelius
description.french: Tuer Evelius.
description.german: Töte Evelius
description.italian: Uccidi Evelius.
description.schinese: 干掉 Evelius。
description.spanish: Mata a Evelius.

description.brazilian: Use o macaco para dar a melhor resposta possível para uma pergunta.
description.english: Use the monkey to give the best possible answer to a question
description.french: Utiliser le singe pour donner la meilleure réponse possible à une question.
description.german: Nutze den Affen, um die bestmögliche Antwort auf eine Frage zu geben
description.italian: Usa la scimmia per dare la risposta migliore a una domanda.
description.russian: Дать наилучший ответ на вопрос с помощью обезьянки.
description.schinese: 用猴子给出问题的最佳答案。
description.spanish: Usa el mono para dar la mejor respuesta posible a una pregunta.
description.turkish: Bir soruya en iyi cevabı vermek için maymunu kullan.

description.brazilian: Pegue um peixe.
description.english: Catch a fish
description.french: Attraper un poisson.
description.german: Fange einen Fisch
description.italian: Prendi un pesce.
description.schinese: 抓到一条鱼。
description.spanish: Atrapa un pez.

displayName.brazilian: Barris de pólvora são um perigo
displayName.french: Un tonneau de poudre, c’est dangereux
displayName.italian: I barilotti di polvere sono pericolosi
displayName.spanish: Los barriles de pólvora son peligrosos

description.brazilian: Veja a torre inteira ir pelos ares.
description.english: See the whole tower explode
description.french: Voir toute la tour exploser.
description.german: Sieh zu, wie der ganze Turm in die Luft fliegt
description.italian: Guarda l'intera torre esplodere.
description.schinese: 观看整座塔楼爆炸。
description.spanish: Presencia como estalla la torre.

displayName.spanish: En busca de la Lucky Tower

description.brazilian: Roube um item de um pedestal sensível ao peso.
description.english: Steal an item from a weight sensitive pedestal
description.french: Voler un objet sur un piédestal sensible au poids.
description.german: Stiehl einen Gegenstand von einem gewichtssensiblen Podest
description.italian: Ruba un oggetto da un piedistallo sensibile al peso.
description.schinese: 从可感知重量的基座上偷走一个物品。
description.spanish: Roba un objeto de un pedestal sensible al peso.
description.turkish: Ağırlık hassasiyetli kaideden bir eşya çal.

description.brazilian: Termine a rotina de banheiro de Von Wanst.
description.english: Finish Von Wanst's bathroom routine
description.french: Terminer la routine de Von Wanst aux toilettes.
description.german: Lass Von Wanst in Ruhe sein Geschäft erledigen
description.italian: Termina la routine da bagno di Von Wanst.
description.schinese: 完成 Von Wanst 的浴室日常。
description.spanish: Acaba la rutina de aseo de Von Wanst.

description.brazilian: Dê dinheiro suficiente a Hubert para ele salvar sua família.
description.english: Give enough money to Hubert to save his family
description.french: Donner à Hubert assez d’argent pour sauver sa famille.
description.german: Gib Hubert genügend Geld, um seine Familie zu retten
description.italian: Dai a Hubert abbastanza soldi per salvare la sua famiglia.
description.russian: Дать Губерту достаточно денег для спасения его семьи.
description.schinese: 给 Hubert 足够的钱，拯救他的家人。
description.spanish: Dona suficiente dinero a Hubert para salvar a su familia.
description.turkish: Hubert'e ailesini kurtarmaya yetecek parayı ver.

description.brazilian: Compre uma casa.
description.english: Buy a house
description.french: Acheter une maison.
description.german: Kaufe ein Haus
description.italian: Compra una casa.
description.schinese: 购买房屋。
description.spanish: Compra una casa.

description.brazilian: Aprimore sua casa.
description.english: Upgrade your house
description.french: Améliorer sa maison.
description.german: Verschönere dein Haus
description.italian: Migliora la tua casa.
description.schinese: 升级房屋。
description.spanish: Mejora tu casa.

description.brazilian: Tenha 300 ou mais moedas na conta bancária.
description.english: Have 300 or more coins in your bank account
description.french: Avoir au moins 300 pièces sur son compte en banque.
description.german: Sammle mindestens 300 Münzen auf deinem Konto
description.italian: Accumula almeno 300 monete nel tuo conto in banca.
description.russian: Накопить не менее 300 монет на банковском счёте.
description.schinese: 银行账户中存有至少 300 个金币。
description.spanish: Ten 300 monedas o más en tu cuenta bancaria.
description.turkish: Banka hesabında en az 300 sikke olsun.

description.brazilian: Receba uma recompensa por matar um monstro.
description.english: Receive a bounty for killing a monster
description.french: Toucher une prime pour avoir tué un monstre.
description.german: Töte ein Monster und erhalte dafür Kopfgeld
description.italian: Incassa una taglia per aver ucciso un mostro.
description.schinese: 干掉怪物，拿到悬赏。
description.spanish: Recibe una recompensa por matar un monstruo.
description.turkish: Bir canavar öldürüp kelle parasını al.

description.brazilian: Vire um monstro.
description.english: Become a monster
description.french: Se transformer en monstre.
description.german: Werde zum Monster
description.italian: Diventa un mostro.
description.schinese: 变成一只怪物。
description.spanish: Conviértete en un monstruo.

description.brazilian: Vire uma vassoura.
description.english: Become a broom
description.french: Se transformer en balai.
description.german: Werde zum Besen
description.italian: Diventa una scopa.
description.schinese: 变成一把扫帚。
description.spanish: Conviértete en una escoba.

description.brazilian: Prepare cinco poções diferentes.
description.english: Brew five different potions
description.french: Concocter cinq potions différentes.
description.german: Braue fünf verschiedene Tränke
description.italian: Prepara cinque pozioni diverse.
description.schinese: 烹煮五份不同的药剂。
description.spanish: Prepara cinco pociones diferentes.

description.brazilian: Passe veneno em uma arma.
description.english: Poison a weapon
description.french: Le poison comme arme.
description.german: Vergifte eine Waffe
description.italian: Avvelena un'arma.
description.schinese: 给一个武器淬毒。
description.spanish: Envenena un arma.

description.brazilian: Transforme algo em ouro.
description.english: Turn something into gold
description.french: Transformer quelque chose en or.
description.german: Verwandle etwas in Gold
description.italian: Trasforma qualcosa in oro.
description.schinese: 将物品变成金子。
description.spanish: Convierte algo en oro.

description.brazilian: Transforme um monstro ou uma vassoura de volta em humano.
description.english: Turn a monster or a broom into a human again
description.french: Retransformer un monstre ou un balai en humain.
description.german: Verwandle ein Monster oder einen Besen zurück in einen Menschen
description.italian: Trasforma un mostro o una scopa di nuovo in un essere umano.
description.russian: Превратить монстра или метлу обратно в человека.
description.schinese: 将怪物或扫帚变回人类。
description.spanish: Convierte a un monstruo o a una escoba en humano de nuevo.
description.turkish: Bir canavarı veya süpürgeyi tekrar insana dönüştür.

description.brazilian: Coma dez itens diferentes.
description.english: Eat ten different items
description.french: Manger dix objets différents.
description.german: Iss zehn verschiedene Gegenstände
description.italian: Mangia dieci oggetti diversi.
description.schinese: 食用十种不同的物品。
description.spanish: Cómete diez objetos diferentes.

description.brazilian: Renasça.
description.english: Get reborn
description.french: Renaître.
description.german: Werde wiedergeboren
description.italian: Rinasci.
description.schinese: 重生。
description.spanish: Renace.

description.brazilian: Salve um vaso frágil da torre.
description.english: Save a fragile vase from the tower
description.french: Sauver un vase fragile de la tour.
description.german: Rette eine zerbrechliche Vase aus dem Turm
description.italian: Metti in salvo un vaso fragile della torre.
description.schinese: 从塔楼中挽救一个易碎的花瓶。
description.spanish: Saca un jarrón frágil de la torre.

description.brazilian: Tenha dois dentes de diamante ao mesmo tempo.
description.english: Have two diamond teeth at the same time
description.french: Avoir deux dents en diamant en même temps.
description.german: Hab zwei Diamantzähne gleichzeitig im Mund
description.italian: Possiedi due denti di diamante contemporaneamente.
description.russian: Завести себе сразу два алмазных зуба.
description.schinese: 同时拥有两颗钻石牙齿。
description.spanish: Ten dos dientes de diamante al mismo tiempo.
description.turkish: Aynı anda iki elmas dişin olsun.

description.brazilian: Levante um item de peso doze vezes seguidas.
description.english: Pick up a weight-item twelve times in a row
description.french: Ramasser douze fois de suite un poids.
description.german: Hebe 12 mal hintereinander ein Gewicht auf
description.italian: Raccogli un oggetto pesante dodici volte di fila.
description.russian: Двенадцать раз подряд поднять тяжёлый предмет.
description.schinese: 连续十二次拾起一个重物。
description.spanish: Levanta un peso doce veces seguidas.
description.turkish: Ağır bir eşyayı art arda on iki kere kaldır.

description.brazilian: Abra um baú trancado.
description.english: Open a locked chest
description.french: Ouvrir un coffre fermé à clé.
description.german: Öffne eine verschlossene Truhe
description.italian: Apri un forziere chiuso a chiave.
description.schinese: 打开一个上锁的宝箱。
description.spanish: Abre un cofre cerrado.

description.brazilian: Torne-se cidadão do vilarejo.
description.english: Become a citizen of the village
description.french: Acquérir la citoyenneté du village.
description.german: Werde Bürger des Dorfes
description.italian: Diventa un cittadino del villaggio.
description.schinese: 成为村里的居民。
description.spanish: Conviértete en un vecino del pueblo.

description.brazilian: Escape da torre pelas cavernas.
description.english: Escape the tower through the caves
description.french: S’évader de la tour par les souterrains.
description.german: Entkomme durch die Höhlen aus dem Turm.
description.italian: Fuggi dalla torre attraverso le caverne.
description.schinese: 通过洞穴逃出塔楼。
description.spanish: Escapa de la torre a través de las cuevas.

description.brazilian: Encontre a sala do tesouro escondida.
description.english: Find the hidden treasure room
description.french: Trouver la salle du trésor cachée.
description.german: Finde die verborgene Schatzkammer.
description.italian: Trova la stanza nascosta del tesoro.
description.schinese: 找到隐藏的宝藏房间。
description.spanish: Encuentra una sala del tesoro secreta.

description.brazilian: Comece a construir a estátua.
description.english: Start building the statue
description.french: Commencer à construire la statue.
description.german: Fang an, die Statue zu bauen.
description.italian: Inizia a costruire la statua.
description.schinese: 开始建造雕像。
description.spanish: Empieza a construir la estatua.

description.brazilian: Construa a estátua pelo menos até o bumbum.
description.english: Build the statue at least up to your buttocks
description.french: Construire la statue jusqu’à hauteur de vos fesses.
description.german: Baue die Statue bis mindestens hoch zum Hintern.
description.italian: Costruisci la statua almeno fino alle natiche.
description.russian: Доделать статую хотя бы до ягодиц.
description.schinese: 将雕像至少建到你的臀部。
description.spanish: Construye la estatua al menos hasta tus nalgas.
description.turkish: Heykeli en az popo hizana kadar yaptır.

description.brazilian: Termine a estátua.
description.english: Finish the statue
description.french: Finir la statue.
description.german: Vollende die Statue.
description.italian: Termina la statua.
description.schinese: 完成雕像。
description.spanish: Termina la estatua.

description.brazilian: Mate 20 trolls.
description.english: Kill 20 trolls
description.french: Tuer 20 trolls.
description.german: Töte 20 Trolle.
description.italian: Uccidi 20 troll.
description.schinese: 干掉 20 头巨怪。
description.spanish: Mata a 20 troles.

displayName.german: Feuer und Flamme für den Handel

description.brazilian: Venda 66 itens diferentes na loja de penhores.
description.english: Sell 66 different items at the pawnshop
description.french: Vendre 66 objets différents au prêteur sur gages.
description.german: Verkaufe 66 unterschiedliche Gegenstände im Pfandleihhaus.
description.italian: Vendi 66 oggetti diversi al banco dei pegni.
description.russian: Продать не менее 66 различных предметов в ломбарде.
description.schinese: 在当铺出售 66 件不同的物品。
description.spanish: Vende 66 objetos distintos en la casa de empeños.

description.brazilian: Coma todos os tipos de cogumelos pelo menos uma vez.
description.english: Eat every kind of mushroom at least once
description.french: Manger chaque type de champignon au moins une fois.
description.german: Iss jede Pilzart mindestens einmal.
description.italian: Mangia ogni tipo di fungo almeno una volta.
description.russian: Съесть гриб каждого вида хотя бы один раз.
description.schinese: 食用所有种类的蘑菇至少一次。
description.spanish: Come todos los tipos de seta al menos una vez.
description.turkish: Her mantardan en az bir kere ye.

description.brazilian: Conserte um cano.
description.english: Repair a pipe
description.french: Réparer un tuyau.
description.german: Repariere ein Rohr.
description.italian: Ripara un tubo.
description.schinese: 修复一根管道。
description.spanish: Repara una tubería.

description.brazilian: Termine de consertar todo o sistema de tubulação.
description.english: Finish fixing the entire pipe system
description.french: Finir de réparer la tuyauterie de la tour.
description.german: Schließe die Reparatur des gesamten Rohrsystems ab.
description.italian: Finisci di aggiustare tutte le tubature.
description.schinese: 整个管道系统修复完成。
description.spanish: Termina de reparar todo el sistema de cañerías.

description.brazilian: Compre um item das Irmãs Encanadoras.
description.english: Purchase an item from the Pipefitter Sisters
description.french: Acheter un objet aux Sœurs Tuyauteuses.
description.german: Kaufe der Rohrschlosserin einen Gegenstand ab.
description.italian: Acquista un oggetto dalle Sorelle tubiste.
description.schinese: 从管道工姐妹那里购买一件物品。
description.spanish: Compra un objeto a las hermanas Fontaneras.

description.brazilian: Ajude o Bardo em sua busca por novos instrumentos.
description.english: Help the bard in his pursuit of new instruments
description.french: Aider le barde dans sa quête de nouveaux instruments.
description.german: Hilf dem Barden bei der Suche nach neuen Instrumenten.
description.italian: Aiuta il bardo a trovare nuovi strumenti.
description.schinese: 帮助吟游诗人找寻新的乐器。
description.spanish: Ayuda al bardo en su búsqueda de nuevos instrumentos.
description.turkish: Ozana yeni enstrüman arayışında yardım et.

description.brazilian: Encontre e saqueie o cadáver do Bardo.
description.english: Find and loot the bard's corpse
description.french: Obtenir du butin sur le cadavre du barde.
description.german: Finde und plündere den Leichnam des Barden.
description.italian: Trova e depreda il cadavere del bardo.
description.russian: Найти тело барда и забрать его вещи.
description.schinese: 找到并搜刮吟游诗人的尸体。
description.spanish: Encuentra y saquea el cadáver del bardo.

displayName.spanish: ¿Metón? Yo ahí no me meto más

description.brazilian: Entre em 10 portas diferentes com nomes acima delas.
description.english: Enter 10 doors with different names above them
description.french: Passer 10 portes différentes avec des noms au-dessus.
description.german: Betrete 10 Türen mit unterschiedlichen Namen darüber.
description.italian: Entra in 10 diverse porte con un nome.
description.russian: Войти в 10 разных дверей с именами над ними.
description.schinese: 进入 10 扇有名字的不同的门。
description.spanish: Entra en 10 puertas distintas con nombres encima.
description.turkish: Üstünde farklı isimler yazan 10 kapıdan geç.

displayName.schinese: 总之先烤，烤着烤着就真成了

description.brazilian: Crie um dente de diamante em um forno.
description.english: Create a diamond tooth in an oven.
description.french: Créer une dent en diamant dans un four.
description.german: Stelle in einem Ofen einen Diamantzahn her.
description.italian: Crea un dente di diamante in un forno.
description.schinese: 在烤箱中制作一颗钻石牙齿。
description.spanish: Crea un diente de diamante en un horno.

description.brazilian: Remova 200 teias de aranha.
description.english: Remove 200 spider webs.
description.french: Retirer 200 toiles d’araignée.
description.german: Entferne 200 Spinnennetze.
description.italian: Rimuovi 200 ragnatele.
description.schinese: 清除 200 张蜘蛛网。
description.spanish: Quita 200 telarañas.

description.brazilian: Liberte a princesa.
description.english: Free the princess.
description.french: Délivrer la princesse.
description.german: Befreie die Prinzessin.
description.italian: Libera la principessa.
description.schinese: 解救公主。
description.spanish: Libera a la princesa.

description.brazilian: Faça a princesa devorar 10 inimigos em uma partida.
description.english: Have the princess eat 10 enemies in one run.
description.french: Faire manger 10 ennemis à la princesse en un run.
description.german: Lass die Prinzessin 10 Gegner in einem einzigen Durchlauf essen.
description.italian: Fai mangiare 10 nemici alla principessa in una sola sessione.
description.russian: Дать принцессе съесть 10 врагов за одно прохождение.
description.schinese: 在一次游戏中让公主吃掉 10 个敌人。
description.spanish: Haz que la princesa se coma a 10 enemigos en una sola ronda.

description.brazilian: Faça a princesa devorar 7 caras do martelo que estejam gritando e correndo.
description.english: Have the princess eat 7 screaming and running hammerguys.
description.french: Faire manger 7 types au marteau vivants à la princesse.
description.german: Lass die Prinzessin 7 schreiende und rennende Hammermänner essen.
description.italian: Fai mangiare alla principessa 7 tizi col martello che gridano e fuggono.
description.russian: Дать принцессе сожрать семь кричащих и бегающих молотобойцев.
description.schinese: 让公主吃掉 7 个活蹦乱跳的锤子怪。
description.spanish: Haz que la princesa se coma a 7 tipos con martillo que chillan y corren.
description.turkish: Prenses'e, bağırıp koşarak gelen 7 Çekiççi yedir.

description.brazilian: Mate 15 inimigos com o ajudante de encanador em uma partida.
description.english: Kill 15 enemies in one run with the plumber's helper.
description.french: Tuer 15 ennemis avec une ventouse en un run.
description.german: Töte 15 Gegner in einem Durchlauf mit dem Pömpel.
description.italian: Uccidi 15 nemici in una sola sessione con lo sturalavandini.
description.russian: Убить 15 врагов с помощью вантуза в одном прохождении.
description.schinese: 在一次游戏中用管道工救星杀死 15 个敌人。
description.spanish: Mata a 15 enemigos con el desatascador en una sola ronda.
description.turkish: Tuvalet pompasıyla tek elde 15 düşman öldür.

description.brazilian: Escape da torre em uma dificuldade maior que Camponês.
description.english: Escape the tower in a difficulty mode above Peasant.
description.french: S’évader de la tour en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Turm auf einem Schwierigkeitsgrad über Bauer.
description.italian: Fuggi dalla torre a una difficoltà superiore a villico.
description.russian: Сбежать из башни на сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин».
description.schinese: 在农民以上的难度模式中逃出塔楼。
description.spanish: Huye de la torre en una dificultad superior al modo campesino.
description.turkish: Köylü modundan zor bir seviyede kuleden kaç.

description.brazilian: Vença a torre sem ter nada na mão (incluindo ratoeiras), sem equipar nada (incluindo dentes) e começando sem itens em uma dificuldade maior que Camponês.
description.english: Beat the tower without ever holding something in your hand (including mousetraps), equipping anything (including teeth) and starting off with no items in a difficulty mode above Peasant.
description.french: Sortir de la tour sans rien ramasser (y compris des pièges à souris) ni équiper (y compris des dents) et en commençant sans objets, en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Bezwingt den Turm, ohne je etwas in der Hand zu halten (auch nicht Mausefallen) oder etwas auszurüsten (auch nicht Zähne), und beginnt ohne Gegenstände in einer Schwierigkeitsstufe über dem Bauern.
description.italian: Finisci la torre senza tenere nulla in mano (incluse le trappole per topi), senza equipaggiare nulla (inclusi i denti) e cominciando la sessione senza alcun oggetto a una difficoltà superiore a villico.
description.russian: На сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин» пройти башню без предметов. В смысле вообще ничего не подбирать и не использовать. Да, зубы тоже считаются!
description.schinese: 在不拿任何东西（包括鼠夹），不装备任何东西（包括牙齿），且开局时没有任何物品的情况下，通关农民以上难度模式。
description.spanish: Supera la torre sin tener nada en la mano en ningún momento (incluyendo ratoneras), sin equiparte con nada (incluyendo dientes) y empezando sin objetos en una dificultad superior al modo campesino.
description.turkish: Köylü modunun üstünde bir zorlukta, eşyasız başlayarak, eline hiçbir şey almadan (fare kapanı dahil) ve hiçbir şey kuşanmadan (diş dahil) kuleyi yen.

description.brazilian: Vença a torre em uma dificuldade maior que Camponês sem usar nenhuma armadura.
description.english: Beat the tower in a difficulty mode above Peasant without ever wearing any armor.
description.french: Sortir de la tour en ne portant aucune armure, en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Bezwinge den Turm ohne je etwas anzuziehen, auf einem Schwierigkeitsgrad über Bauer.
description.italian: Finisci la torre a una difficoltà superiore a villico senza indossare alcuna armatura.
description.russian: Пройти башню, ни разу не надев броню на сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин».
description.schinese: 在农民以上的难度模式中，不穿任何盔甲通关。
description.spanish: Supera la torre en una dificultad superior al modo campesino sin llevar armadura en ningún momento.
description.turkish: Köylü modundan zor bir zorluk seviyede, hiç zırh giymeden kuleyi yen.

description.brazilian: Saia da torre com um grupo de 5 companheiros em uma dificuldade maior que Camponês.
description.english: Leave the tower with a party of 5 companions in a difficulty mode above Peasant.
description.french: Sortir de la tour avec un groupe d’au moins 5 compagnons, en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Verlass den Turm mit einer Gruppe von 5 Begleitern, auf einem Schwierigkeitsgrad über Bauer.
description.italian: Lascia la torre con un gruppo di 5 compagni a una difficoltà superiore a villico.
description.russian: Покинуть башню с командой из 5 спутников на сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин».
description.schinese: 在农民以上的难度模式中，带着 5 个同伴离开塔楼。
description.spanish: Abandona la torre con un grupo de 5 acompañantes en una dificultad superior al modo campesino.
description.turkish: Köylü modundan zor bir seviyede, 5 yoldaşla birlikte kuleden kaç.

description.brazilian: Mate o jogador de copos sem usar armas em uma dificuldade maior que Camponês.
description.english: Kill the cup player with bare hands in a difficulty mode above Peasant.
description.french: Tuer le maître des gobelets à mains nues, en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Töte den Hütchenspieler mit bloßen Händen, auf einem Schwierigkeitsgrad über Bauer.
description.italian: Uccidi il tazziere a mani nude a una difficoltà superiore a villico.
description.russian: Убить напёрсточника голыми руками на сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин».
description.schinese: 在农民以上的难度模式中，徒手杀死杯子玩家。
description.spanish: Mata al trilero con tus manos desnudas en una dificultad superior al modo campesino.
description.turkish: Köylü modundan zor bir seviyede, bul karacıyı çıplak elle öldür.

description.brazilian: Mate o mestre das charadas sem usar armas em uma dificuldade maior que Camponês.
description.english: Kill the riddlemaster with bare hands in a difficulty mode above Peasant.
description.french: Tuer le maître des énigmes à mains nues, en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Töte den Rätselmeister mit bloßen Händen, auf einem Schwierigkeitsgrad über Bauer.
description.italian: Uccidi il signor Enigmista a mani nude a una difficoltà superiore a villico.
description.russian: Убить загадочника голыми руками на сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин».
description.schinese: 在农民以上的难度模式中，徒手杀死谜语大师。
description.spanish: Mata al Maestro del Adivinar con tus manos desnudas en una dificultad superior al modo campesino.
description.turkish: Köylü modundan daha bir seviyede, bulmaca ustasını çıplak elle öldür.

description.brazilian: Saia da torre com pelo menos 50 moedas em uma dificuldade maior que Camponês.
description.english: Leave the tower with at least 50 coins in a difficulty mode above Peasant.
description.french: Sortir de la tour avec au moins 50 pièces en poche, en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Verlass den Turm mit mindestens 50 Münzen, auf einem Schwierigkeitsgrad über Bauer.
description.italian: Lascia la torre con almeno 50 monete a una difficoltà superiore a villico.
description.russian: Покинуть башню, имея при себе не менее 50 монет на сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин».
description.schinese: 在农民以上的难度模式中，带着至少 50 枚硬币离开塔楼。
description.spanish: Abandona la torre con al menos 50 monedas en una dificultad superior al modo campesino.
description.turkish: Köylü modundan zor bir seviyede, kuleyi en az 50 altınla terk et.

description.brazilian: Tenha 10 cortes de cabelo diferentes.
description.english: Own 10 different haircuts.
description.french: Obtenir 10 coupes différentes.
description.german: Zeig dich mit 10 verschiedenen Frisuren.
description.italian: Possiedi 10 diverse acconciature.
description.schinese: 拥有 10 种不同的发型。
description.spanish: Ten 10 peinados distintos.

description.brazilian: Leia um livro.
description.english: Read a book.
description.french: Lire un livre.
description.german: Lies ein Buch.
description.italian: Leggi un libro.
description.schinese: 读一本书。
description.spanish: Lee un libro.

name: All fresh from the stache stash

displayName.brazilian: Quem não tem bigode se sacode
displayName.english: All fresh from the stache stash
displayName.italian: Novità dal mondo del pelo virile
displayName.spanish: Unos lo tienen largo, otros lo tienen corto

description.brazilian: Tenha 10 barbas ou bigodes diferentes.
description.english: Own 10 different beards or mustaches.
description.french: Obtenir 10 barbes et moustaches différentes.
description.german: Zeig dich mit 10 verschiedenen Bärten.
description.italian: Possiedi 10 diverse barbe o baffi.
description.russian: Заполучить 10 различных вариантов бороды или усов.
description.schinese: 拥有 10 种不同的胡须或胡子造型。
description.spanish: Ten 10 barbas o bigotes distintos.

description.brazilian: Liberte um companheiro da câmara de tortura.
description.english: Free a companion from the torture chamber.
description.french: Libérer un compagnon de la chambre de torture.
description.german: Befreie einen Begleiter aus der Folterkammer.
description.italian: Libera un compagno dalla sala delle torture.
description.schinese: 从拷问室解救一名同伴。
description.spanish: Libera a un acompañante de la cámara de torturas.

description.brazilian: Compre 5 companheiros em máquinas de venda.
description.english: Buy 5 companions at vending machines.
description.french: Acheter 5 compagnons aux distributeurs.
description.german: Kaufe 5 Begleiter an Automaten.
description.italian: Compra 5 compagni ai distributori.
description.schinese: 在贩卖机购买 5 名同伴。
description.spanish: Compra 5 acompañantes en máquinas expendedoras.

description.brazilian: Compre um porão para sua casa.
description.english: Buy a cellar for your home.
description.french: Acheter un sous-sol pour la maison.
description.german: Kaufe einen Keller für dein Haus.
description.italian: Compra uno scantinato per la tua casa.
description.schinese: 为你的家购买一个地窖。
description.spanish: Compra un sótano para tu casa.

description.brazilian: Compre um sótão para sua casa.
description.english: Buy an attic for your house.
description.french: Acheter un grenier pour la maison.
description.german: Kaufe einen Dachboden für dein Haus.
description.italian: Compra un attico per la tua casa.
description.schinese: 为你的家购买一个阁楼。
description.spanish: Compra un desván para tu casa.

description.brazilian: Morra caindo da varanda da sua própria casa.
description.english: Die by falling off the balcony in your own house.
description.french: Mourir en tombant du balcon de sa propre maison.
description.german: Stirb, indem du in deinem eigenen Haus vom Balkon fällst.
description.italian: Muori cadendo dal terrazzo di casa tua.
description.russian: Умереть, упав с балкона собственного дома.
description.schinese: 从你家阳台掉下去摔死。
description.spanish: Muere cayéndote del balcón de tu propia casa.

description.brazilian: Transforme um item.
description.english: Transform an item.
description.french: Transformer un objet.
description.german: Verwandele einen Gegenstand.
description.italian: Trasforma un oggetto.
description.schinese: 变化一个物品。
description.spanish: Transforma un objeto.

description.brazilian: Coma 10 gosmas em uma partida.
description.english: Eat 10 goos in one run.
description.french: Manger 10 fois de la boue en un run.
description.german: Iss zehn Glibber bei einem Durchgang.
description.italian: Mangia 10 melme in una sessione.
description.russian: Съесть 10 сгустков слизи за одно прохождение.
description.schinese: 在一次游戏中吃掉 10 个黏液。
description.spanish: Cómete 10 pringues en una sola ronda.

description.brazilian: Mate um companheiro empunhando tenazes com carvão quente enquanto usa um capuz de torturador.
description.english: Kill a companion wielding pliers with hot coal while wearing a torturer's hood.
description.french: Tuer un compagnon en équipant des pinces avec du charbon ardent ainsi qu’un capuchon de tortionnaire.
description.german: Töte einen Begleiter mit einer Zange mit glühender Kohle, während du eine Henkerkapuze trägst.
description.italian: Uccidi un compagno impugnando le pinze con carboni ardenti mentre indossi il cappuccio da boia.
description.russian: Убить спутника щипцами с раскалённым углём, надев капюшон палача.
description.schinese: 拷问先生-穿着拷问者头套、手持带着热炭的钳子杀掉一名同伴。
description.spanish: Mata a un acompañante empuñando unas tenazas con carbón caliente mientras llevas una capucha de torturador.
description.turkish: İşkenceci başlığı takarken közlü mandalla bir yoldaşını öldür.

description.brazilian: Escape da torre em 5 minutos ou menos em um nível de dificuldade acima do Modo Camponês.
description.english: Escape the tower in 5 minutes or less in a difficulty above Peasant Mode.
description.french: S’évader de la tour en 5 minutes ou moins en difficulté supérieure au mode paysan.
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Turm in 5 Minuten oder weniger auf einer Schwierigkeitsstufe über Bauer.
description.italian: Fuggi dalla torre in meno di 5 minuti a una difficoltà superiore a villico.
description.russian: За 5 минут сбежать из башни на сложности выше уровня «Простолюдин».
description.schinese: 在农民以上的难度模式中，5 分钟以内逃出塔楼。
description.spanish: Huye de la torre en 5 minutos o menos en una dificultad superior al modo campesino.
description.turkish: Köylü Modu’ndan yüksek bir zorlukta, 5 dakika veya altında kuleden kaç.
